# Analyzers Docs

> Roslyn-based code analyzers that detect issues at compile time for platform compatibility, API usage, and code quality. The Platform Compatibility Analyzer identifies OS-specific API usage; use `[SupportedOSPlatform]` and `OperatingSystem.IsWindows()` guards for cross-platform code.

- [Platform compatibility analyzer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/analyzers/platform-compat-analyzer.md): A Roslyn analyzer that can help detect platform compatibility issues in cross-platform apps and libraries.
- [The .NET Portability Analyzer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/analyzers/portability-analyzer.md): Learn how to use the .NET Portability Analyzer tool to evaluate how portable your code is among the various .NET implementations, including .NET Core, .NET Standard, and UWP.
